name: ShootEm?
description:
Welcome to "ShootEm?", a Singleplayer Multiplayer game. 

You might be wondering, "Hey Coco, why is there a question mark on the title of the game". Well, I think that's a fair questin, my friend. But you will have to download it to find it out.

There is an in-game tutorial, so PLEASE READ IT

Thank you  :).
